meanings.definition: A person who engages in partner swapping or group sexual activities.
meanings.sent1: The swingers at the party were open-minded and enjoyed trying new experiences.
meanings.sent2: The group of swingers decided to explore different relationships together.
meanings.sent3: The swingers joked about having a 'key party' where they would swap partners for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of swingers, trust and communication are key elements for a successful experience.
meanings.sent5: The concept of swingers may seem unconventional to some, but it is a consensual choice for those involved.

meanings.definition: A person who is lively, fashionable, and sociable.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the life of the party, a true swinger who lit up the room with her energy.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends admired her as a natural-born swinger who always knew how to have a good time.
meanings.sent3: The young swinger turned heads with her trendy outfit and confident attitude.
meanings.sent4: Her vibrant personality made her a social swinger, effortlessly blending in at any gathering.
meanings.sent5: As a swinger, she effortlessly charmed everyone she met with her outgoing nature and stylish flair.

meanings.definition: A device used for swinging back and forth.
meanings.sent1: The playground had colorful swings where children could enjoy being swingers.
meanings.sent2: The old swing set in the backyard was a favorite spot for the kids to play as swingers.
meanings.sent3: The broken swing creaked loudly, making it a less than ideal choice for aspiring swingers.
meanings.sent4: The porch swing became a peaceful retreat for the family, gently swaying like a comforting swinger.
meanings.sent5: The park had a variety of swings, from simple wooden ones to elaborate ones, catering to all kinds of swingers.
